get.summary: Get all markerlists in the database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID that specify the markerlist, auto generated by system.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the new markerlist that user specified.

parameters.name: markers
parameters.description: The list of markers that user specify into the form.

get.summary: Get specific markerlist with its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The markerlist id that user want to fetch from the markerlist table.

delete.summary: Remove the existing markerlist inside the database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id that define the markerlist that we want to remove.
